mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET BOOK_ID = #{bookId}, BOOK_NAME = #{bookName}, PRICE = #{bookPrice}, WRITER = #{writer}, GRADE = #{grade}, STOCK_SEQ = #{bookseq}, OPTION_ID = #{optionBook}, GENRE_ID = #{genreId} WHERE BOOK_ID = #{bookId}
mapper.select: Select BOOK_ID AS bookId, BOOK_NAME AS bookName, PRICE AS bookPrice, WRITER AS writer, GRADE AS grade, STOCK_SEQ AS bookseq, OPTION_ID AS optionBook, GENRE_ID AS genreId FROM BOOK ORDER BY bookId DESC LIMIT #{start}, 4
